    Exodus Unseen 2018

















    One Piece Wonder 2017 Whole garment sweater and pants knitted on Shima Seiki Mach 2x 8 gauge machine using the Apex3 software, then linked together using a linking machine. Design on back and legs printed on Shima Seiki SIP-160F3 flatbed inkjet printer with reactive ink.















    Mellow Yellow 2017 Whole garment knitted on Shima Seiki Mach 2x 8 gauge machine using the Apex3 software. Yarn; 3-Ply, 8/1 MT 100% COTTON, 20/1 100% COTTON, 18/1 100% COTTON, Dyed using direct dyes. Dyed twice for more rich golden color





    Gestural Symmetry 2015 "This garment was made in collaboration with Eleanor Yeh inspired by MC Escher. The pattern pieces were engineered in order for the textile design to fit perfectly together. It was printed on the Mutoh MC3 Digital Textile Printer onto fabric and sewn together."







    Journey Lines 2017















    Encaustic Experimentation 2016 Candle wax, pen and ink
